panels.description: Free Capacity of the whole file system

targets.query: SELECT "sum" FROM "cqm_ost_kbytesinfo_free-fs_name" WHERE "fs_name" = '$fs_name' AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Free Capacity in Total

panels.description: Used Capacity of the whole file system

targets.query: SELECT "sum" FROM "cqm_ost_kbytesinfo_used-fs_name" WHERE "fs_name" = '$fs_name' AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Used Capacity in Total

targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "ost_kbytesinfo_free" WHERE "fs_name" = '$fs_name' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ost_index"
SELECT "value" FROM "ost_kbytesinfo_used" WHERE "fs_name" = '$fs_name' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ost_index"

panels.description: The used capacity for each user.

targets.query: SELECT "sum" FROM "cqm_ost_acctuser_samples-fs_name-optype-user_id" WHERE "fs_name" = '$fs_name' AND "optype" = 'usage_kbytes' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "user_id"

panels.title: Used Capacity per User

panels.description: The used capacity for each group.

targets.query: SELECT "sum" FROM "cqm_ost_acctgroup_samples-fs_name-group_id-optype" WHERE "fs_name" = '$fs_name' AND "optype" = 'usage_kbytes' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "group_id"

panels.title: Used Capacity per Group

rows.title: Capacity and Inode Usage of Lustre

panels.description: Free inode number on each MDT.

targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "mdt_filesinfo_free" WHERE "fs_name" = '$fs_name' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "mdt_index"

panels.title: Free Inode Number per MDT

panels.description: The used inodes for each user.

targets.query: SELECT "sum" FROM "cqm_mdt_acctuser_samples-fs_name-optype-user_id" WHERE "fs_name" = '$fs_name' AND "optype" = 'usage_inodes' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "user_id"

panels.title: Used Inode Number per User

panels.description: The used inodes for each user.

targets.query: SELECT "sum" FROM "cqm_mdt_acctgroup_samples-fs_name-group_id-optype" WHERE "fs_name" = '$fs_name' AND "optype" = 'usage_inodes' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "group_id"

panels.title: Used Inode Number per Group

panels.description: Used inode number on each MDT.

targets.query: SELECT "value" FROM "mdt_filesinfo_used" WHERE "fs_name" = '$fs_name' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "mdt_index"

panels.title: Used Inode Number per MDT

panels.description: I/O Bandwith of the whole file system

targets.query: SELECT "sum" FROM "cqm_ost_stats_bytes-fs_name-optype" WHERE "fs_name" = '$fs_name' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "optype"

panels.title: I/O Bandwith in Total

panels.description: The I/O bandwith for each OST.

targets.query: SELECT "sum" FROM "cqm_ost_stats_bytes-fs_name-ost_index" WHERE "fs_name" = '$fs_name' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ost_index"

panels.title: I/O Bandwith per OST

panels.description: The write bandwith for each OST.

targets.query: SELECT "sum" FROM "cqm_ost_stats_bytes-fs_name-optype-ost_index" WHERE "fs_name" = '$fs_name' AND "optype" = 'write' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ost_index"

panels.title: Write Bandwith per OST

panels.description: The read bandwith for each OST.

targets.query: SELECT "sum" FROM "cqm_ost_stats_bytes-fs_name-optype-ost_index" WHERE "fs_name" = '$fs_name' AND "optype" = 'read' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ost_index"

panels.title: Read Bandwith per OST

panels.description: Metadata Operation Rate of the whole file system

targets.query: SELECT "sum" FROM "cqm_md_stats-fs_name" WHERE "fs_name" = '$fs_name' AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Metadata Operation Rate  in Total

panels.description: The metadata operation  rate for each MDT.

targets.query: SELECT "sum" FROM "cqm_md_stats-fs_name-mdt_index" WHERE "fs_name" = '$fs_name' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "mdt_index"

panels.title: Metadata Operation Rate per MDT

panels.description: The metadata operation  rate for each client.
panels.title: Metadata Operation Rate per Client

panels.description: The operation  rate for each type of metadata operation

targets.query: SELECT "sum" FROM "cqm_md_stats-fs_name-optype" WHERE "fs_name" = '$fs_name' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "optype"

panels.title: Metadata Operation Rate per Type

targets.query: SELECT sum("sum") FROM "cqm_ost_jobstats_samples" WHERE ( "optype" = 'sum_write_bytes' OR "optype" = 'sum_read_bytes' ) AND "fs_name" = '$fs_name' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "job_id" fill(null)
SELECT sum("sum") FROM "cqm_ost_jobstats_samples" WHERE "optype" = 'sum_write_bytes' AND "fs_name" = '$fs_name' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "job_id" fill(null)

SELECT sum("sum") FROM "cqm_ost_jobstats_samples" WHERE ( "optype" = 'sum_write_bytes' OR "optype" = 'sum_read_bytes' ) AND "fs_name" = '$fs_name' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m), "job_id" fill(null)

rows.title: Bandwith and Metadata Rate per Job

targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "aggregation.cpu-average.cpu.system" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)

list.label: Filesystem Name
list.name: fs_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "md_stats" WITH KEY = fs_name
